nodes.text: The environment room was a location aboard the luxury liner Kuari Princess, situated on the Recreation Deck. It replicated exotic locations in exacting detail, using holo-augmentation and imported fauna and flora. The environment varied from cruise to cruise; during the voyage where the Kuari Princess was attacked by the Riders of the Maelstrom, the environment room recreated the Esraza Temple on the planet Oligtaz.
